description:
一、填空题
1.Tom and Mary ___________ (come) to China last month.
2.Mike _________________(not go) to bed until 12 o’clock last night. So I _______ (get ) up late. 3.Mary __________ (read) English yesterday morning.
4.There _________ (be) no one here a moment ago.
5.I ___________ (call) Mike this morning.
6.I listened but ___________ (hear) nothing.
7.Tom ___________ (begin) to learn Chinese last year.
8.Last week we _________ (pick) many apples on the farm.
9.My mother ________________ (not do) housework yesterday.
10.She watches TV every evening. But she _______________ (not watch) TV last night.
参考答案：
1.came 2. didn’t go got 3. read 4. was 5. called 6.heard 7.began 8.picked 9.didn’t do 10.didn’t watch
二、用适当的词完成下列对话
1.— How was your weekend? — It ______ great. — What _______ you ______ last weekend ? — I _______ some homework.
2.— What ______ she ______ last weekend? — She _______ to the beach.
3.— What _______ they do last weekend? — They ________ to the movies.
参考答案：1.was did do did 2.did do went 3.did went
1.I _________ (have) an exciting party last weekend.
2.2. _________ she _________(practice) her guitar yesterday? No, she _________.
3.What ________ Tom ________ (do) on Saturday evening? He ________(watch) TV and __________(read) an interesting book.
4.They all _________(go) to the mountains yesterday morning.
5.She _________(not visit) her aunt last weekend. She ________ (stay) at home and _________(do) some cleaning.
参考答案：
1.had 2. Did; practice; didn't 3.did; do; watched; read 4.went
三、改写句子：(20)
1、Lucy did her homework at home.（改否定句）Lucy ________ _______ her homework at home. 2、He found some meat in the fridge（冰箱）.（变一般疑问句) ___________ he __________ ___________ meat in the fridge?
3、There was some orange in the cup.（变一般疑问句)_______ there _______ orange in the cup?
4.Frank read an interesting book about history. （一般疑问句） _______ Frank _______ an interesting book about history?
5. Why not go out for a walk? （同义句） _______ ________ ________ out for a walk?
参考答案：
1.didn't do 2. Did; find any 3. Was; any 4. Did; read 5. Why don't you go


本周最热文章

  • Quora精选：为何那么多外国人喜欢来中国？
  • 双语美文：如果无法看清现状，能力没有价值
  • 直男的格子衫，时尚界的沙林毒气
  • 老外分享超棒生活小技巧：一定要试 麻吉实用
  • 有声美文：精彩人生的11个快乐秘诀
  • 《西部世界》S01E02追剧笔记：你无法扮演上帝
  • 迪士尼真人版《花木兰》启用白人男主 哈？！
  • 万万没想到：求婚场所TOP10 第一竟然是……
  • 托福阅读超级省时法则
  • 奥巴马任期内最后一次国宴 盛装出席苦乐参半

title: 提升自己：一般过去时的练习题及答案

description:
一 、选择题
1 She lived there before he____to China.
A.came B. comes C. come D. coming
2 I _____but_____nothing.
A . was listened；was hearing B. listened；heard C . have listened；heard D. listened； heard of
3 When did you ____here？
A.got to B. reached C. arrive in D. reach
4 I____my homework at 7：00 yesterday evening. A. finished B. would finish C. was finishing D. finish
5 -He didn't go shopping with you yesterday afternoon,did he？ - _______.
A.No， he doesn't B. Yes， he didn't C. No， he did D. Yes， he did.
6 -I have had supper. - When ____you____it？
A.have； had B. do， have C. did，have D. will have
答案： 1 A 2 B 3 D 4 A 5 D 6 C
二、填空题：
1.Father bought me a new bike.(改为同义句)
Father bought _________ __________ _________ ___________me.
2.Frank read an interesting book about history.(改为一般疑问句)
___________ Frank ____________ an interesting book about history?
3.He cleaned his room yesterday. (对划线部分提问)
__________ __________ he __________ yesterday?
4.Thomas spent 10 yuan on this book.(改为否定句)
Thomas ________ _________ 10 yuan on this book.
5.Why not go out for a walk?(同义句)
_______ _______ _________ ________out for a walk?
6.My family went to the beach last week.(对划线部分提问)
_________ ________ __________ family ___________ last week?
7.I had some friends.（改为否定句和一般疑问句）
I ________ ________ ___________ friends.
__________ __________ have ___________ friends?
8.Sally did some reading in the morning last year.(改为否定句)
Sally _________ _________ _________ __________in the morning last year.
9. She did some washing yesterday.(改为一般疑问句)
__________ _________ _________ __________ washing yesterday?
10.We visited our teacher last night.(对划线部分提问)
_________ _________ you ________ last night?
11. Do you go to school by bus every Monday?(用last Monday 替换every Monday) _________ you ___________ to school by bus ___________ ______________?
12. There was some water in the bottle.(改为一般疑问句)
________ __________ _________ in the bottle?
参考答案： 1. a new bike for 2. Did, read 3. What did do 4. didn’t spend 5. Why don’t you go 6. Where did your go 7. didn’t have any; Did you any 8. didn’t do any reading 9. Did she do any 10. What did do 11. Did go last Monday 12. Was there any
